name: tamamini
description:
"Ready to see your new companion!"

3/14/1990

We recently found out  the first version of a popular kids game.

With the help of two teams of developpers, we were able to re-compile the game into a playable version! But we need to warn you, the game contains flashing lights and loud noises, play with caution.

Music by : https://twitter.com/SnowprintMusic
